summary: Human Rights Law PhD candidate, Multilingual, International Affairs Specialist, Combat Veteran. Twenty years of experience in multinational operations, consulting, advisory and international affairs in developed and underdeveloped nations in Africa, Asia and Latin America. I have been in charge of nation reconstruction in post conflict regions and been an advisor for host nation executive level officials. In addition, I have extensive experience with peacekeeping operations, ethno-religious conflict resolution and nation reconstruction in post conflict areas. I speak 8 languages fluently (English, German, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, Indonesian, Malay, Chavacano). MBA, MA International Affairs/National Security, LLM International Human Rights Law
